---
title: "About me"
---

I am Assistant Professor at the [Department of Industrial Engineering](https://www.uninorte.edu.co/web/departamento-de-ingenieria-industrial) of the [Universidad del Norte](https://www.uninorte.edu.co/) in Barranquilla, Colombia. 

I earned a PhD in Medical Sciences (Genomics and Precision Medicine) from the prestigiuous [John Curtin School of Medical Research](https://jcsmr.anu.edu.au/) in Canberra, ACT, Australia, under the supervision of [Dr. Mauricio Arcos-Burgos](https://scholar.google.com.co/citations?user=MZlwFqgAAAAJ&hl=en).

My research interest include Bioinformatics, Population Genetics, Genetic Epidemiology, Predictive Genomics and Data Analytics.

You can contact me by [email](mailto:jvelezv@uninorte.edu.co).
